title: Ron DeSantis STRIKES BACK at GAY GAY GAY Hollywood! | Guest: Ben Shapiro
description:
Ron DeSantis signed his parental rights bill, and idiots still think he outlawed the word "gay." Join us as we revel in the meltdown. Also, you KNOW we have thoughts on Will Smith. And tumbler merchant Ben Shapiro joins the show! #DontSayGay #WillSmith #BenShapiro
